snippet: Avril D. Haines, the top lawyer at the National Security Council, will replace the deputy director of the Central Intelligence Agency, who is retiring.
abstract: Central Intelligence Agency’s deputy director Michael J Morell is retiring after 33 years at the agency and will be replaced by Avril D Haines, top lawyer at National Security Council; move will place a woman in one of CIA’s top two jobs for first time.
lead_paragraph: Avril D. Haines, the top lawyer at the National Security Council, will replace the deputy director of the Central Intelligence Agency, who is retiring.

headline.main: C.I.A. to Get First Woman in No. 2 Job
headline.print_headline: Retirement At C.I.A. Lets First Woman Get No. 2 Job
